content.value:
When Inventor Clayton Tedeton learned the Miracle II formula through Divine Revelation, he thought he was just making a soap (albeit a blessed one). Soon, he discovered Miracle Soap cleans virtually everything, without the drawbacks and foul ingredients of ordinary soaps and detergents. Listen about the inspired origins of Miracle II products as told by originator Clayton Tedeton. Click on the links below for streaming audio. But that was just the beginning. Now, after decades of use by thousands and thousands of satisfied customers, Miracle II products are put to thousands of uses daily, with new applications reported to us all the time! Truly Miraculous Products! We say Miracle II products clean or freshen just about anything. The satisfied users of Miracle II products say so much more. Read the personal testimonies and their discovery of uses for Miracle II products.




 Light Cleaning: Use this on glass, mirrors, countertops, stainless steel, refrigerators, fiberglass, leathers and plastic.

Miracle Soap (1/8 oz) + Miracle Neutralizer (1/8 oz) to a 32oz spray bottle.
Note: Add water very slowly.





Medium Cleaning: Dishes, floors, bathrooms, tile, cabinets, paneling, refrigerator, skin, carpet, spot remover, upholstery, stainless steel, fiberglass, automobile, mildew, soot on brick and stone.

Miracle Soap (2 oz) + Miracle Neutralizer (2 oz) to a 32 oz spray bottle.
Note: Add water very slowly.





Heavy Cleaning: Floors, grease traps, drains, pots, pans, dishes, ovens, glass fireplace doors, white sidewall tires, bad carpet stains, holding tanks on campers, clothes, wax stripper, steam cleaning, oil on carports - garages, crazy glue cleanup.

Miracle Soap (4 oz) + Miracle Neutralizer (4 oz) to 32 oz spray bottle
Note: Add water very slowly.





For Heavy Odors
Fish, seafood, onion, garlic, dog/cat, refrigerators, bathrooms, clothes, holding tanks on boats and campers, odors in carpets.

The Miracle Neutralizer you have added in with Miracle Soap will "Neutralize" odors,
Spray odorous area down and leave solution on for extended time. It's safe for all area's.
If odors are very strong, spray area with Miracle Neutralizer without diluting, let stand.

Miracle Neutralizer has no cover up perfumes - just a clean no odor area.




Oven Cleaning
Use #3 Heavy cleaning solution in spray bottle. Heat oven to warm then turn off. Spray well. Let set for 2 or 3 hours or over night if possible. Just wipe away with cloth or sponge. You don't even need gloves! Can you believe cleaning an oven and getting a hand treatment at the same time?




 Agriculture
Reported that adding 4oz of Miracle II Neutralizer to 25 gallons of water sprayed on grass per acre will make a cow gain 1.4 lbs per day more than on unsprayed grass.





 Carpet Spot Cleaning
Use #2 Medium cleaning solution in spray bottle. Spray spots; brush, then towel up.
If stain has been on carpet for a long time, and it will not clean up this way, spray again and lay a damp cloth on the spot and leave overnight. Spray and brush again and towel up. This will take care of 99% of your spots.




 Garden
Mix 2oz of Miracle Neutralizer and 2oz of Miracle Soap per 5 gallons of water and spray garden every two weeks, or as needed. Soap will control the bugs and balance the soil, while the Neutralizer should product healthy plant results. Water well after applying the spray. A natural and organic way to maintain your fruits and vegetables.




 Lawn
Maintenance: Mix 2oz of Miracle Neutralizer and 2oz of Miracle Soap in a gallon of water and spray at a rate of 4oz per acre.

Another report: Using an Ortho Sprayer, add пїЅ ounce of Miracle Soap and 8oz of Miracle Neutralizer and set the amount to a 1oz setting = (1oz per gallon of water sprayed) Apply once every 2 weeks. The soap will help in detoxifying the soil, and assist in bug control. The soap will not harm your vegetation. Overtime this should bring your soil to a neutral pH balanced state. Continue to use your fertilizer program as needed.




 Spots on Clothes
Use #2 Medium cleaning solution in spray bottle. Spray on and let stand for 2 hours before you put into washing machine. Use from пїЅ teaspoon to 1 oz Miracle Soap in machine. If you're wearing the garment, spray and towel off.




Trees and Shrubs; Fruit and Citrus
Mix 2oz of Miracle Neutralizer and 2oz of Miracle Soap per 5 gallons of water and spray garden every two weeks, or as needed. Soap will control the bugs and balance the soil, while the Neutralizer should product healthy plant results.



 Washing Clothes
Use пїЅ oz to 1 oz of Miracle Soap right from the bottle. To soften and deodorize, add 1oz of Miracle Neutralizer.




 Wax Stripper
Use #3 Heavy cleaning solution in spray bottle, and cover floor area. Let stand 5 - 10 minutes. Then wet with water. Mop or use scrubber. Miracle Soap will not harm your "No Wax" floors. Try and see the floor shine.




 Insects on Plants
TO KILL INSECTS ON PLANTS: Add пїЅ oz of Miracle Soap to a 32 oz spray bottle or 1 oz per gallon. Spray Plant when insects are present, follow up with repeating spraying if necessary. Everyone has reported great results. When using Miracle Soap in a total cleanup area, said they stopped having bug problems in 30 days.




 Insects
Wasps, Roaches, Spiders, Water Bugs, and Bees. Add 1 oz of Miracle Soap to a 32 oz spray bottle. Spray insects. To control larger areas use Insects on Plants formula to control vicinity around lawn and decks.




Fire Ants
Add 1 oz of Miracle Soap in one gallon of water. Stir ant bed up and pour the solution on them. If you will do this early and late - you will kill more of them. Everyone has reported great results.




 Animals
Calling Animal Lovers! Are you looking for a complete all natural shampoo for your
Dog, Cat or Horse. We've heard from perfectionist - there is none better! We think you'll agree. You can use Miracle Soap or Miracle Soap w/ Moisturizer for a lustrous coat that looks natural and shows beautiful. After drying, spray with Miracle Neutralizer for odor control and skin care. Heals rashes, and cuts on dogs, cats and horses. Great results.
MiracleSoap products are all natural and contain no perfumes, dyes, preservatives or harsh chemicals, making it great for you and your animals.




Litter Box
Spray with Miracle Neutralizer. This will take the smell away.




 Auto and Truck
Put Miracle Soap in the bottom of your wash bucket and fill. This will create a large amount of suds. If you have a hand sprayer with a soap dispenser, dilute 50/50 with water. It will make your paint shine. If you hand wax your car will notice Miracle Soap is gentle enough not to strip it off. People have reported their Auto / Truck looks nicer and that Miracle Soap cleans road grime off the first time washing. Great for cleaning carpets and engines also.




Citric Tree Blight
Miracle Neutralizer. Try this on any tree, bush, flower or garden plants. Add 2 oz of Miracle Neutralizer per gallon of water, foliage feed, every 7 days for supernatural growth and production.
